Compact 1400W Travel Hair Dryer. This dryer comes with a concentrator nozzle for precision styling. Concentrators are great for achieving shine too - when drying your hair make sure you point the concentrator nozzle down the hair shaft as this means your hair's cuticles will lie flat and look oh-so glossy. If you are crying out for the perfect travelling companion to keep your tresses in check whilst away on business or play then look no further - this dinky dryer is super lightweight.
